text:
e="preserve">Jacques Bral (21 September 1948 – 17 January 2021) was a French movie director, screenwriter, and producer. He was also a painter. He was born in Tehran, Iran. Bral directed and wrote the 2012 movie "Black Really Suits You". He wrote the 1989 crime movie "Street of No Return".
Bral died in Paris on 17 January 2021 at the age of 72.
